name: Daily Competitor Research Automation using SerpAPI, Google Sheets & Airtable

user.name: Avkash Kakdiya
user.bio:
üöÄ Founder of iTechNotion ‚Äî we build custom AI-powered automation workflows for startups, agencies, and founders.
üí° Specializing in agentic AI systems, content automation, sales funnels, and digital workers.
üîß 14+ years in tech | Building scalable no-code/low-code solutions using n8n, OpenAI, and other API-first tools.
üì¨ Let‚Äôs automate what slows you down.

description:
### How it works
This workflow automatically collects a list of companies from Google Sheets, searches for their competitors using SerpAPI, extracts up to 10 relevant competitor names with source links, and logs the results into both Google Sheets and Airtable. It runs on a set schedule, cleans and formats the company list, processes each entry individually, checks if competitors exist, and separates results into successful and ‚Äúno competitors found‚Äù lists for organized tracking.

### Step-by-step
**1. Trigger & Input**
- Auto Run (Scheduled) ‚Äì Executes every day at the set time (e.g., 9 AM).

- Read Companies Sheet ‚Äì Pulls the list of companies from a Google Sheet (List column).

- Clean & Format Company List ‚Äì Removes empty rows, trims names, and attaches row numbers for tracking.

- Loop Over Companies ‚Äì Processes each company one at a time in batches.

**2. Competitor Search**
- Search Company Competitors (SerpAPI) ‚Äì Sends a query like "{Company} competitors" to SerpAPI, retrieving structured search results in JSON format.

**3. Data Extraction & Validation**
- Extract Competitor Data from Search ‚Äì Parses SerpAPI results to:

- Identify the company name

- Extract up to 10 competitor names

- Capture the top source URL

- Count total search results

- Has Competitors? ‚Äì Checks if any competitors were found:

- Yes ‚Üí Proceeds to logging

- No ‚Üí Logs in ‚Äúno results‚Äù list

**4. Logging Results**
- Log to Result Sheet ‚Äì Appends or updates competitor data into the results Google Sheet.

- Log Companies Without Results ‚Äì Records companies with zero competitors found in a separate section of the results sheet.

- Sync to Airtable ‚Äì Pushes all results (successful or not) into Airtable for unified storage and analysis.

### Benefits
- Automated Competitor Research ‚Äì Eliminates the need for manual Google searching.

- Daily Insights ‚Äì Runs automatically at your chosen schedule.

- Clean Data Output ‚Äì Stores structured competitor lists with sources for easy review.

- Multi-Destination Sync ‚Äì Saves to both Google Sheets and Airtable for flexibility.

- Scalable & Hands-Free ‚Äì Handles hundreds of companies without extra effort.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

parameters.content:
## Auto Run (Scheduled)

**Description:**

‚è∞ This is the starting point of the workflow. It runs automatically based on your configured schedule‚Äîno manual trigger needed.

## Loop Over Companies

**Description:**

üìã Fetch companies from a Google Sheet (List column).

üßπ Clean and format data, removing empty entries and attaching row numbers.

üîÅ Send companies into the flow using a Lopp Over node for processing.

## Search Company Competitors (SerpAPI)

**Description:**

üîç For each company, this node sends a GET request to SerpAPI with the query {company} competitors, returning structured search result JSON for further parsing.

## Extract & Check Competitors

**Description:**

Extracts the company name, up to 10 competitors, and top source from SerpAPI results.
Then checks if any competitors were found:

‚úÖ Yes ‚Üí Send to Google Sheet + Airtable

‚ùå No ‚Üí Log as failed search

## Log Results to Sheets & Airtable

**Description:**

Logs successful competitor data to Google Sheets ‚úÖ

Logs failed searches separately ‚ùå

Both flows sync to Airtable for unified storage üì•
